introduction: Fill out an online form to register your boat's details with the UK coastguard. This is a free service.
more_information:
Your details will be available to Maritime Rescue Co-ordination Centres (MRCCs) throughout the UK.

^You need to update your details every 2 years.^

*[MRCCs]: Maritime Rescue Co-ordination Centres
*[MRCC]: Maritime Rescue Co-ordination Centre
overview: Register your boat with the UK coastguard using the Maritime and Coastguard Agency's voluntary safety scheme (CG66)
title: Register your boat with the coastguard's safety scheme
will_continue_on: the Maritime and Coastguard Agency website
